name: Freakish Farming
description:
Made for the 2022 REGENERATE GameJam, FreakishFarming is an endless farming game in which you utilize regenerative farming in order to make money and expand your farm.

Scrapped Content:

- 4  maps

- 4 Enemies

- Scythe Upgrades

- Combat system

Controls:

- Movement - WASD

- Plant - Q

- Harvest - E

- Attack - Left Click

- Select Seeds - Scroll Wheel

Credits:

- shubibubi - cozy farming pack & cozy people pack.

- Jordan "Cptjokane" Kanon - Programming (Farming & Inventory)

- Matt "Mutton" Sutton      - Programming (Character)

- Sebastian "Cardboard"    - Programming (Environment & Enemies)

- Michael "Cain2266" Southon - Sprite & Animation editing.
